body_html: If accuracy is 0.1%, that means that some part of the network is behaving completely differently, which means it should be easy to debug layer by layer on a specific input and see where the big change is happening. Is that possible? Try deleting layers from the end of your model until the resulting tensors match, and then the problematic layer will be the one.
